title: Proposing to amend article 11 of the constitution of the state of Kansas by adding a new section establishing the freedom from taxes fund, establishing the Kansas citizens freedom review board, authorizing the board to review tax exemptions and approve or eliminate such exemptions and eliminating the state-imposed property taxes and income and privilege taxes.

other_titles.title: A PROPOSITION to amend article 11 of the constitution of the state of Kansas by adding a new section thereto; establishing the freedom from taxes fund; establishing the Kansas citizens freedom review board; authorizing the board to review tax exemptions and approve or eliminate such exemptions; eliminating the state-imposed property taxes, income and privilege taxes.
